overview:
As a serial entrepreneur, Johnny Wahba has been involved as a founder/operator/investor in businesses in a variety of industries ranging from manufacturing to digital media, from real estate to the food industry.

“I’m always looking to help others in the pursuit to start a new venture. If you are looking for help with transitioning your new idea into a successful business, send me a message.”

Specialties Start ups, Internet technology, real estate, deal structures and partnerships, creative finance, operations and marketing.
